channel.title: RS font
channel.description:
Someone successfully render this rs font and show me how to do it, cause all i get is this shit [attached] (it works fine in other applications, but java fucks it up hard)
http://members.home.nl/maxthedragon/downloads/RSFont.zip

item.title: RS font
item.dc:creator: @1337h4x 1337h4x
item.description:
@1337h4x wrote:

[quote=“lawl, post:1, topic:135737”][quote author=1337h4x link=topic=187207.msg1691056#msg1691056 date=1187760661]
Dude, you can download the runescape font on runehq at fakes section.
[/quote][quote author=MastrChief link=topic=187207.msg1691061#msg1691061 date=1187760799]
http://www.chatshack.us/web/upload/upload/RuneScape.zip
[/quote]
are you guys blind? i posted the link to the rs font, im saying i cant render it properly using java[/quote]I remember I got it to draw properly lemme try to find the project

EDIT:

[code] g.setFont(rsFont);
g.setColor(Color.BLACK);

	g.drawString(t, p.x, p.y + 1);
	
	g.setColor(Color.YELLOW);
	
	g.drawString(t, p.x, p.y);[/code][code]	Font rsFont = new Font("Runescape", Font.BOLD, 16);[/code]

outcome:
